entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to periods of rain mixed with wet snow near noon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late this afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 6 April 2023
